requirements.summary: Prepare the existing Bhojpur Classic marketing SPA for an Internet Computer production deployment and document the exact publish steps.
acceptanceCriteria: A production deployment is performed (not just a local/preview build).
A public URL is provided that loads the Bhojpur Classic marketing page successfully over HTTPS.
Core interactions work on the live site (navigation scroll links and tel: click-to-call links for +91 878-9514659).
No placeholder/preview-only references are present in the live deployment output.

file_operations.description: Remove unnecessary authentication/provider wiring for a static marketing site (e.g., Internet Identity + react-query providers) to reduce production runtime/config risk while keeping the rendered MarketingPage unchanged.

Harden production HTML metadata for live hosting (ensure correct title/description and avoid any preview-only references), keeping the app entry script compatible with production bundling on the Internet Computer.

Verify production-safe behavior for core interactions (smooth-scroll navigation and click-to-call link), ensuring the tel: link continues to use the +91 878-9514659 number from branding content without introducing preview-only references.
Verify production-safe click-to-call CTA behavior for +91 878-9514659 (tel: link), ensuring no environment-specific/preview-only assumptions are present.

Add step-by-step production publishing instructions for deploying the existing frontend to the Internet Computer (including build + deploy commands, where to obtain the final HTTPS URL, and a post-deploy smoke-check list for scroll links and tel: links). Use the github-export-icp-cli template guidance where applicable; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
